articles.title: Telegram adds video editor and more creative tools - Engadget
articles.description: A robust Telegram update has added video editing to the messaging app, according to a recent blog post. The “most powerful photo editor to be implemented in a messaging app,” as Telegram described it, can now be used to make a variety of changes to video.
articles.content:
A robust Telegram update has added video editing to the messaging app, according to a recent blog post. Users can also add animated stickers to media, along with several other new features.

articles.description: The muscled-up sibling to the 2021 BMW 4 Series Coupe unveiled earlier this week takes that car's already controversial front-end treatment to new extremes.

articles.title: The new MacBook Pro 13 is pretty boring, but still very good - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Instead of a full redesign, the 13-inch Apple MacBook Pro only gets the new keyboard as well as current Ice Lake processor. Did the manufacturer miss an opportunity or can the old design still shine in 2020?
articles.content: The current 2020 MacBook Pro 13 has not changed much at a first look. Many things are the same, like the case, the ports, and the display. The less expensive model with 2x Thunderbolt 3 even keeps th… [+1934 chars]
